name: A Virtuous Run
description:
A game where you have to get to the end as fast as possible! Though, the theme of "Size Matters" will only make sense until you get to the end, but I promise you, it's worth the effort! :D   Kind of a walking simulator, but also a platformer and a small puzzle in thrown in there!

All assets were made by me!

Timelapse on its development!
